verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. In thee, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, do I take refuge <S%H2620><s%>; Let me never <S%H408><s%> be put to shame <S%H954><s%>: Deliver <S%H6403><s%> me in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

Bow down <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H5337><s%>; Deliver me speedily <S%H4120><s%>: Be thou to me a strong <S%H4581><s%> rock <S%H6697><s%>, A house <S%H1004><s%> of defence <S%H4686><s%> to save me <S%H3467><s%>.
For thou art my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>; Therefore for thy name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake lead <S%H5148><s%> me and guide me <S%H5095><s%>.
Pluck me out <S%H3318><s%> of the net <S%H7568><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> they have laid privily <S%H2934><s%> for me <S%H4581><s%>; For thou art my stronghold.
Into thy hand <S%H3027><s%> I commend <S%H6485><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%>: Thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, thou God <S%H410><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%>.
I hate <S%H8130><s%> them that regard <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities <S%H1892><s%>; But I trust <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

I will be glad <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>; For thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> my affliction <S%H6040><s%>: Thou hast known <S%H3045><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in adversities <S%H6869><s%>;
And thou hast not shut me up <S%H5462><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>; Thou hast set <S%H5975><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in a large place <S%H4800><s%>.

Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, for I am in distress <S%H6887><s%>: Mine eye <S%H5869><s%> wasteth <S%H6244><s%> away with grief <S%H3708><s%>, yea <S%H5315><s%>, my soul and my body <S%H990><s%>.

For my life <S%H2416><s%> is spent <S%H3615><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%>, And my years <S%H8141><s%> with sighing <S%H585><s%>: My strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H3782><s%> because of mine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, And my bones <S%H6106><s%> are wasted away <S%H6244><s%>.

Because of all mine adversaries <S%H6887><s%> I am become a reproach <S%H2781><s%>, Yea <S%H7934><s%>, unto my neighbors exceedingly <S%H3966><s%>, And a fear <S%H6343><s%> to mine acquaintance <S%H3045><s%>: They that did see <S%H7200><s%> me without <S%H2351><s%> fled from me <S%H5074><s%>.
I am forgotten <S%H7911><s%> as a dead man <S%H4191><s%> out of mind <S%H3820><s%>: I am like a broken <S%H6><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>.

For I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the defaming <S%H1681><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%>, Terror <S%H4032><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>: While they took counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against me <S%H2161><s%>, they devised to take away <S%H3947><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%>.
But I trusted <S%H982><s%> in thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah: I said <S%H559><s%>, Thou art my God <S%H430><s%>.
My times <S%H6256><s%> are in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of mine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and from them that persecute me <S%H7291><s%>.
Make thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> upon thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: Save <S%H3467><s%> me in thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>.

Let me not be put to shame <S%H954><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For I have called <S%H7121><s%> upon thee <S%H7563><s%>: Let the wicked be put to shame <S%H954><s%>, let them be silent <S%H1826><s%> in Sheol <S%H7585><s%>.

Let the lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> be dumb <S%H481><s%>, Which speak <S%H1696><s%> against the righteous <S%H6662><s%> insolently <S%H6277><s%>, With pride <S%H1346><s%> and contempt <S%H937><s%>.

Oh how great <S%H7227><s%> is thy goodness <S%H2898><s%>, Which thou hast laid up <S%H6845><s%> for them that fear <S%H3373><s%> thee <S%H6466><s%>, Which thou hast wrought for them that take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in thee <S%H1121><s%>, Before the sons of men <S%H120><s%>!

In the covert <S%H5643><s%> of thy presence <S%H6440><s%> wilt thou hide <S%H5641><s%> them from the plottings <S%H7407><s%> of man <S%H376><s%>: Thou wilt keep them secretly <S%H6845><s%> in a pavilion <S%H5521><s%> from the strife <S%H7379><s%> of tongues <S%H3956><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he hath showed me his marvellous <S%H6381><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in a strong <S%H4692><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>.

As for me <S%H559><s%>, I said in my haste <S%H2648><s%>, I am cut off <S%H1629><s%> from before <S%H5048><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>: Nevertheless <S%H403><s%> thou heardest <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%> When I cried unto thee <S%H7768><s%>.

Oh love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all ye his saints <S%H2623><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> preserveth <S%H5341><s%> the faithful <S%H539><s%>, And plentifully <S%H3499><s%> rewardeth <S%H7999><s%> him that dealeth <S%H6213><s%> proudly <S%H1346><s%>.
Be strong <S%H553><s%>, and let your heart <S%H3824><s%> take courage <S%H2388><s%>, All ye that hope <S%H3176><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
